events.eventDesc: After several successful coding hackathons, the coding club of IISERB returns with another thrilling and this time an even bigger hackathon, an inter-college coding competition to be held across 2 days. Brace yourself for challenging problems and the opportunity to showcase your programming prowess in this two-day codathon.

Tech Expo - the ultimate gathering for innovators, entrepreneurs, and tech enthusiasts alike! It involves a vibrant ecosystem of cutting-edge startups, captivating tech pitches, engaging tech stalls and insightful talks by tech entrepreneurs . Whether you're looking to network, explore groundbreaking innovations, or showcase your own tech venture, Tech Expo is your platform to conquer

Join us for an exciting Arduino workshop at our tech fest! Learn to harness the power of this versatile microcontroller platform to bring your electronic projects to life. Discover the basics of Arduino programming, explore hardware interfacing, and dive into hands-on projects designed to ignite your imagination. Whether you're a beginner or an enthusiast, this workshop is your gateway to the world of electronics and innovation.

Join us for a captivating Guest Lecture at our tech fest! Participants will get a chance to engage with industry leaders, innovators, and experts as they share valuable insights on the latest trends and technologies shaping our world.
